mosais.model

Class Tesselation

  • java.lang.Object
    • mosais.model.Tesselation

  • public class Tesselation
extends java.lang.Object
    This class models the generation of a tessalation by coordinating the generation of a distribution and using the distributed points to redraw the image selected by the user.
    Author:
    Andrew Trismen

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.awt.image.BufferedImage image
      The image to be modified
      private PlotTree tree
      The quadtree backed data structure storing the distribution

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Tesselation(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image, PlotTree tree)
      Construct a new tesselation to modify the given image using the given plot tree.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void applyMosaic()
      Create a mosaic pattern in the image by setting all pixels in the image to the same color as the closest distribution point.
      void cleanUp()
      To run after completing a run of processing.
      void createDistribution()
      Generate the distribution of points in an area the size of the image.
      void drawPoints(int rgb)
      Draw the points generated in the distribution.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • image

        private java.awt.image.BufferedImage image
        The image to be modified

      • tree

        private PlotTree tree
        The quadtree backed data structure storing the distribution

    • Constructor Detail

      • Tesselation

        public Tesselation(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
           PlotTree tree)
        Construct a new tesselation to modify the given image using the given plot tree.
        Parameters:
        image - Image to modify.
        tree - PlotTree implementation to store and process points of the distribution.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if either parameter is null.

    • Method Detail

      • createDistribution

        public void createDistribution()
        Generate the distribution of points in an area the size of the image.

      • drawPoints

        public void drawPoints(int rgb)
        Draw the points generated in the distribution.
        Parameters:
        rgb - The RGB color to draw the pixels.

      • applyMosaic

        public void applyMosaic()
        Create a mosaic pattern in the image by setting all pixels in the image to the same color as the closest distribution point.

      • cleanUp

        public void cleanUp()
        To run after completing a run of processing. Nulls references to the data structures to save space and prepare for another run.
